## isBoolean() function

`n`이 Boolean이면 true를 반환합니다.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isBoolean: <T>(input: T) => input is T & boolean
```

## Example

```ts
isBoolean(true); // true
isBoolean(null); // false
isBoolean("FxTS"); // false
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/isBoolean.ts)
